name: Scuba Diving in Andaman
description:
Andaman is an ideal tourist destination to experience some of the amazing water activities in India. Amongst all these water activities, Scuba Diving is the most popular. It is through Scuba Diving that the visitors get the heavenly opportunity to step into the enchanting aqua world and explore its endless beauty.

The Elephant Beach serves as the perfect spot to undertake Scuba Diving. Whether the amateurs or the expert diver, this beach offers overwhelming Scuba experience to everyone. PADI certified instructors guide the visitors to make this delightful journey, an experience of a lifetime.
